data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Benxi, Liaoning, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Benxi, Liaoning, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Benxi, Liaoning, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary: On average, 84 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Benxi, Liaoning, China.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 85,184 believers in the county of Benxi.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: There are 1,122,900 people living in the county of Benxi. Only about 85,184 might be believers.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Xibe people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Xibe people.
Father, it’s possible most of the 1,019,575 lost people in  Benxi, Liaoning, China have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Benxi, Liaoning, China to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.section_summary:
the county of Benxi, Liaoning, China has a population of 1,122,900.

We estimate Benxi has 85,184 people who might know Jesus, 18,140 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,019,575 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the county of Benxi.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.
